Multi-functional Shower Head: Create a shower head that can be easily detached and converted into a handheld sprayer, allowing users to use it for various purposes such as cleaning, watering plants, or washing pets. The handheld sprayer could also have adjustable spray settings for different cleaning needs.

Eco-friendly Shower Head: Design a shower head that uses less water per minute than traditional shower heads, reducing water consumption and lowering water bills. The shower head could also be equipped with a timer that encourages users to limit their shower time.

Aromatherapy Shower Head: Develop a shower head that can dispense scented oils or essential oils into the water stream, creating a relaxing and therapeutic shower experience. The shower head could also have adjustable settings for different scents and intensities.

Customizable Shower Head: Create a shower head that can be customized to fit individual user preferences. The shower head could have adjustable settings for water pressure, temperature, and spray pattern, as well as interchangeable nozzles for different showering needs.

Self-cleaning Shower Head: Design a shower head that can clean itself using UV light or other sanitizing technologies, reducing the buildup of soap scum and mineral deposits. The shower head could also have a built-in filter to remove impurities from the water.
